text: Gjakova (Albanian language) Gjakova or Gjakovë; , Đakovica;) is a city and municipality in western Kosovo. It is also the administrative centre of the district with the same name. The municipality's population is estimated at 150,000 (2007).OSCE , October 2007. Retrieved on 9 March 2008. The city is located at . ==References== Category:Settlements in Kosovo Category:Settlements in Serbia
